LoggerAPI Reference Log Class Reference

  • Classes
    • Log
  • Enums
    • LoggerMessageType
  • Protocols
    • Logger

Log

public class Log

A class of static members used by anyone who wants to log mesages.

  • logger

    An instance of the logger. It should usually be the one and only reference of the actual Logger protocol implementation in the system.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static var logger: Logger?
  • verbose(_:functionName:lineNum:fileName:)

    Log a log message for use when in verbose logging mode.

    Parameter

    Parameter msg: The message to be logged

    Parameter

    Parameter functionName: The name of the function invoking the logger API. Defaults to the actual name of the function invoking this function.

    Parameter

    Parameter lineNum: The line in the source code of the function invoking the logger API. Defaults to the actual line of the actual function invoking this function.

    Parameter

    Parameter fileName: The file of the source code of the function invoking the logger API. Defaults to the file of the actual function invoking this function.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public static func verbose(_ msg: String, functionName: String = #function,
        lineNum: Int = #line, fileName: String = #file )

    Parameters

    msg

    The message to be logged
    functionName

    The name of the function invoking the logger API. Defaults to the actual name of the function invoking this function.
    lineNum

    The line in the source code of the function invoking the logger API. Defaults to the actual line of the actual function invoking this function.
    fileName

    The file of the source code of the function invoking the logger API. Defaults to the file of the actual function invoking this function.

  • isLogging(_:)

    A function that will indicate if a message with a specified type (LoggerMessageType) will be outputted in the log (i.e. will not be filtered out).

    Parameter

    Parameter type: The type of message that one wants to know if it will be output in the log.

    Returns

    A Bool indicating whether, if true, or not a message of the specified type (LoggerMessageType) will be outputted.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class func isLogging(_ level: LoggerMessageType) -> Bool

    Parameters

    type

    The type of message that one wants to know if it will be output in the log.

    Return Value

    A Bool indicating whether, if true, or not a message of the specified type (LoggerMessageType) will be outputted.
